title: Pool Party Rek'Sai
body:
Rito pls shark in a bikini

I did some changes to the art work
http://puu.sh/dpzUz/a951658e0a.jpg
Changes include:

* Shading adjustment
* Slight bikini changes
* Entirely redone left arm
* Bigger jaws (Nom nom)
* Took my signature out of the way
* She doesn't have a fat right pinky finger any more

Old art work:
http://puu.sh/doeNB/076b446edd.jpg
